metadata.title: CVE-2024-27017 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:netfilter: nft_set_pipapo: walk over current view on netlink dumpThe generation mask can be updated while netlink dump is in progress.The pipapo set backend walk iterator cannot rely on it to infer whatview of the datastructure is to be used. Add notation to specify if userwants to read/update the set.Based on patch from Florian Westphal.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
